statement.p: Explain why the vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ 1 \\ 0 \\ 3 \\ 5 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -6 \\ -1 \\ 1 \\ -3 \\ 5 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ -3 \\ 4 \\ -5 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} 18 \\ -5 \\ 5 \\ -7 \\ -19 \end{array}\right] are linearly dependent or linearly independent.

answer.p: The vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ 1 \\ 0 \\ 3 \\ 5 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -6 \\ -1 \\ 1 \\ -3 \\ 5 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ -3 \\ 4 \\ -5 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} 18 \\ -5 \\ 5 \\ -7 \\ -19 \end{array}\right] are linearly dependent .
